item.title: Test LaTeX Post
item.description:
This is a test post for LaTeX rendering.

Inline math: $E = mc^2$

Display math: $$ \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} e^{-x^2} dx = \sqrt{\pi} $$

More inline: $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{n^2} = \frac{\pi^2}{6}$
